text: The Deerslayer is a 1957 American western adventure movie directed by Kurt Neumann and is the fourth adaption of the 1841 novel of the same name by James Fenimore Cooper. It stars Lex Barker, Rita Moreno, Forrest Tucker, Cathy O'Donnell, Jay C. Flippen, Carlos Rivas and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1957 adventure movies Category:1950s Western (genre) movies Category:1950s American adventure movies Category:American Western (genre) movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Kurt Neumann
title: The Deerslayer (1957 movie)
